name: music_school_site
description: Demo Site for a music school

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin lessons.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/lessons.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html

author: Daniel Brett
